entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 36. POP 30%
